---
title: Venv Activation Blocked
description: Fix script execution blocked error when activating venv.
author: Dante
---

<Steps>

### Open PowerShell as administrator

Press `Win + X` and select Windows PowerShell (Admin) or search for PowerShell,
right-click, and choose Run as Administrator.

### Set the Execution Policy

Run the following command in the PowerShell window:

```bash
Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned
```

### Confirm the Change

Hit Enter. When prompted, type `A` to allow all scripts and press Enter again to confirm the change.

### Reopen Your Code Editor

Close and reopen your code editor (VS Code, for example). After doing this, you should now be able
to activate the virtual environment without any issues.

</Steps>
